channel.title: {help}no one can log into my server!
channel.description: hi i,m trying to host rs2 server but no on can log into it even I, when i enter my ip address i can,t log in but when i type 0.0.0.0 or localhost it work i think it becuase of network address translation(NAT) does anyone know how to disable/remove NAT or make server work thanx

item.title: {help}no one can log into my server!
item.dc:creator: @MMcGrady2 MMcGrady2
item.description:
@MMcGrady2 wrote:

Well, make sure you port forwarded your router. If you did, make sure the IP address you entered when port forwarding it is correct. Also, you MUST have a router to have a no-ip server. If you don’t have a router, make sure HAMACHI is running while your server’s runserver.bat is also running.

Read full topic
item.source: {help}no one can log into my server!
